about_the_game:
Insurgence- Last Wishes is set three years after Insurgence- Second Assault. Insurgence Last Wishes is a 2D Narrative Heavy JRPG game that follows Richa on her journey to fulfill her pledges and reach Elysium. Richa must navigate through a challenging world filled with obstacles and enemies, all while staying true to her promises. The game emphasizes a strong narrative experience, with rich characters and immersive storytelling. Players will join Richa on her quest, as she battles to keep her pledge and ultimately reach Elysium. With its blend of engaging gameplay, intricate plot, and memorable characters, Insurgence Last Wishes is a must-play for any fan of JRPGs.



The Charge Turn battle mechanic in Insurgence Last Wishes is a unique and strategic element that allows players to sacrifice their turn in order to deal extra damage on the next one. Players can choose to charge their attack, building up power and creating an opportunity for a more powerful strike. This mechanic adds a layer of strategy to battles, as players must weigh the risk of sacrificing their turn for the potential reward of a powerful attack. With the Charge Turn battle mechanic, players can play to their own strengths, adapting their strategy on the fly to suit their playstyle and overcome their opponents.



In Insurgence Last Wishes, players embark on an adventure filled with unique characters, each with their own captivating story. Through visual novel-style dialogue, players will experience a new type of narrative, as they interact with characters and learn about their motivations and personalities. As players progress through the game, they will see the characters' stories intertwine, creating an intricate tapestry of plots and subplots.

The dialogue in Insurgence Last Wishes is written to provide an immersive, interactive experience. Players will feel like they are a part of the world, influencing the outcome of events and the fate of the characters. With its dynamic and engaging narrative, Insurgence Last Wishes is sure to captivate players and keep them coming back for more.



Insurgence Last Wishes blends traditional JRPG elements with an innovative narrative experience, creating a unique and unforgettable gaming experience. The story integrates seamlessly with the gameplay, allowing players to unlock new skills and abilities based on their choices and progress. The outcome of events and the paths that players take will impact the development of their characters, creating a customized experience with each playthrough.

As players progress through the story, they will encounter a range of challenges that test their skills and abilities. With each decision they make, they will learn and grow, unlocking new abilities and abilities that complement their playstyle. Whether they choose to take a more combat-focused approach or to focus on puzzle-solving and exploration, the game adapts to their choices, offering a unique and tailored experience with each playthrough. With its innovative integration of narrative and gameplay, Insurgence Last Wishes offers a one-of-a-kind experience for players of all levels.



Insurgence Last Wishes boasts a stunning and immersive world, brought to life through the power of its custom post-processing and pixel rendering pipeline. The game pushes the limits of 2D RM games, delivering a breathtaking visual experience in 1080p resolution. With its advanced technology, the game creates a vivid and detailed world, full of color and life.



Enjoy the breathtaking work of Award-Winning Composer Masdito Bachtiar (Composer from A Space For The Unbound, She & The Light Bearer, and When The Past Was Around) and Award-Winning Illustrator Einira Yuuei (CSP Competition Winner, Wacom Competition Winner, Daily Deviation Award at DeviantArt) to ensure you get the best narrative experience from Insurgence - Last Wishes.

Extra Notes 1

Playing previous entries in the Insurgence series is not mandatory to understand the story of Insurgence- Bloodmoon, but it is highly recommended to do so if you want to be more familiar with the world and characters of the Insurgence series.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.15 Catalina (x86) / MacOS 11.2 Big Sur (Apple Silicon)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3317U (x86) / Apple M1 (Apple Silicon)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 (x86) / Apple G13G GPU 7 Cores (Apple Silicon)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 Bit 44.1 Khz
  • Additional Notes: Minimum: Mac from 2012 or newer.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS 12.4 Monterey
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4260U (x86) / Apple M1 (Apple Silicon)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000 (x86) / Apple G13G GPU 8 Cores (Apple Silicon)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 24 Bit 192 Khz
  • Additional Notes: Reccomended: Mac from 2014 or newer. On Apple SIlicon the game runs natively.

  • Processor: AMD Athlon II X3 455 / Intel Core2 Quad Q8300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6450 / Nvidia GeForce GT 520 / Intel HD 4600
